00001 package se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.conversion.simulink.preprocessing;
00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.Collection;
00005 
00006 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList;
00007 
00008 
00009 import Simulink.Port;
00010 import Simulink.ProtoObject;
00011 import Simulink.System;
00012 
00018 public abstract class PortProcessor {
00019 
00020         ArrayList<ProtoObject> list = new ArrayList<ProtoObject>();
00021         System theSystem;
00022         SystemLayouter layouter;
00023 
00024         protected void init(System aSystem, SystemLayouter layouter) {
00025                 this.theSystem = aSystem;
00026                 this.layouter = layouter;
00027         }
00028 
00029         protected <P extends Port> Collection<? extends ProtoObject> process(EList<P> ports) {
00030                 for (P port : ports ) {
00031                         processPort( port );
00032                         list.add( port );
00033                 }
00034                 return list;
00035         }
00036 
00037         protected <P extends Port> void processPort(P port) {
00038                 computeInstanceName( port );
00039                 computePosition( port );
00040         }
00041 
00042         protected void computePosition(Port port) {
00043                 String position = port.getPosition(); 
00044                 if ( (position==null) || (position.isEmpty()) ) {
00045                         position = layouter.nextPort();
00046                         port.setPosition(position);
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00055         protected <P extends Port> void computeInstanceName(Port port) {
00056                 String parentName = this.getParentName( port );
00057                 this.addTypeSuffixIfNeeded( port );
00058                 String simuName = parentName + '/' + port.getName();
00059                 port.setSimulinkName(simuName); 
00060 }
00061 
00062         protected abstract void addTypeSuffixIfNeeded(Port port);
00063         
00064         protected String getParentName(Port port) {
00065                 return "subClass responsibility";
00066         }
00067 }
